```{r}
#general token frequency
freq_1939 <- corpus_1939 %>%
dfm() %>%
textstat_frequency() %>%
as_tibble() %>%
dplyr::select(feature, frequency) %>%
rename(Token = feature, AF = frequency) %>%
mutate(RF = AF/sum(AF)*100)

freq_1942 <- corpus_1942 %>%
dfm() %>%
textstat_frequency() %>%
as_tibble() %>%
dplyr::select(feature, frequency) %>%
rename(Token = feature, AF = frequency) %>%
mutate(RF = AF/sum(AF)*100)

```
